metadata.title: CVE-2015-8507 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: mediaserver in Android 6.0 before 2015-12-01 allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) viaa crafted media file, aka internal bug 24157524, a different vulnerabilitythan CVE-2015-6616, CVE-2015-8505, and CVE-2015-8506.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
